games.title: Games
games.subtitle: Manage local executables and launch with selected profile.
games.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this game? This action cannot be undone.

editor.launchArgsPlaceholder: Type an argument and press Enter
editor.argsLocked: Arguments are locked for this game.
editor.modeLocked: Launch mode is locked and cannot be changed.
editor.vhdMissing: Base and patch VHD paths are required for VHD mode.

config.title: INI Editor
config.subtitle: Edit segatools.ini values and manage profiles.
config.activateFirst: Please activate a game in the Game List to edit its configuration.
config.createProfileMessage: Enter a name for the new profile:
config.deleteProfileMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This action cannot be undone.
config.trustWarningMessage: This appears to be a non-open-source trusted build of segatools. Please redeploy the trusted version.
config.trustMissingMessage: segatools files are missing. Please deploy the trusted version.

deploy.title: Deploy segatools
deploy.subtitle: Download, verify, and install a trusted segatools build for the active game.
deploy.activateFirst: Please activate a game in the Game List to deploy.
deploy.updateDetail: A newer version of segatools is available.
deploy.confirmMessage: Existing files will be backed up and overwritten ({{count}} file(s)). Sample: {{files}}

deployGames.title: Game Image Decrypter
deployGames.subtitle: Decrypt OS/APP/OPTION containers and extract content.
deployGames.keySubtitle: Place fsdecrypt_keys.json next to the app or provide a URL.
deployGames.filesSubtitle: Select one or more container files to decrypt.

utilities.title: Utilities
utilities.subtitle: Built-in tools you can enable or hide as needed.
utilities.emptySubtitle: Enable utilities in Settings or check for updates.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.subtitle: Optional modules and utilities bundled with the app.
extensions.disabledBody: Enable {{name}} in Settings to use it.

downloadOrder.title: Download Order
downloadOrder.subtitle: Send a DownloadOrder request and decode the response.
downloadOrder.headersHint: One header per line, format: Key: Value.
downloadOrder.decodedEmpty: Decoded response is empty. Showing raw data.

json.title: JSON Editor
json.subtitle: Edit config_xxxx.json files under the active game directory.
json.activateFirst: Please activate a game in the Game List to edit its JSON configs.
json.noneFound: No config_xxxx.json files found in the game folder.
json.commonNotice: Only credit, allnet_auth, allnet_accounting, aime, and emoney are editable for common files.

data.title: Data
data.subtitle: Manage AMFS/OPTION/APPDATA content using segatools paths.
data.optionEmpty: No options found in this folder.
data.amfsMissing: AMFS path missing or not found; configure segatools.ini first.

aime.title: Aime
aime.subtitle: Manage global Aime card IDs and apply to the active game.
aime.noActiveGame: Select an active game to apply an Aime card.
aime.noActiveGameHint: You can still manage the global list without an active game.
aime.currentMissing: No Aime detected for the active game (aimePath is empty or file missing).
aime.currentNotSaved: This Aime is not saved in your list.
aime.invalidNumber: Aime number must be exactly 20 digits.
aime.targetHint: Writes to aimePath from segatools.ini (current profile).

mods.title: Mods
mods.subtitle: Manage MelonLoader mods for Sinmai.
mods.noActiveGame: Select an active game to manage mods.
mods.unsupported: Mods are only supported for Sinmai right now.
mods.melonloaderMissing: MelonLoader not detected. Install it in the game folder first.
mods.empty: No mods found in Mods folder.
mods.dropHint: Drop files here to add mods
mods.unsupportedGame: This game does not support Mods.

autoUpdate.title: Check for updates on startup
autoUpdate.desc: When enabled, ConfigArc checks GitHub Releases at launch and prompts before installing.

updater.title: Update Available
updater.checkUpdateDesc: Check if a new version is available

path.label: Driver path
path.desc: Specify a path for a third-party card reader driver DLL. Default is empty (use built-in emulation based on text files and keyboard input).

path.label: Driver path
path.desc: Specify a path for a third-party maimai DX IO driver DLL.

enable.label: Enable Aime emulation
enable.desc: Enable Aime card reader assembly emulation. Disable to use a real SEGA Aime reader.

portNo.label: COM port
portNo.desc: Sets the COM port to use for the aime card reader assembly.

highBaud.label: High baud (115200)
highBaud.desc: Enables the high baudrate of the Aime card reader to be 115200 (instead of 38400). Required for some games (e.g. Chunithm).

gen.label: Generation
gen.desc: Changes the Aime card reader generation (1, 2, or 3).

aimePath.label: Aime card file
aimePath.desc: Path to a text file containing a classic Aime IC card ID.

aimeGen.label: Generate Aime ID
aimeGen.desc: Whether to generate a random AiMe ID if the file at aimePath does not exist.

felicaPath.label: FeliCa file
felicaPath.desc: Path to a text file containing a FeliCa e-cash card IDm serial number.

felicaGen.label: Generate FeliCa ID
felicaGen.desc: Whether to generate a random FeliCa ID if the file at felicaPath does not exist.

scan.label: Scan key (VK code)
scan.desc: Virtual-key code. If this button is held then the emulated IC card reader emulates an IC card in its proximity.

enable.label: Enable VFD emulation
enable.desc: Enable VFD emulation. Disable to use a real VFD GP1232A02A FUTABA assembly.

portNo.label: COM port
portNo.desc: Sets the COM port to use for the VFD.

utfConversion.label: Convert to UTF
utfConversion.desc: Converts the strings from the VFD from their respective encoding to UTF.

enable.label: Enable amvideo stub
enable.desc: Enable stub amvideo.dll. Disable to use a real amvideo.dll build.

timezone.label: Force JST timezone
timezone.desc: Make the system time zone appear to be JST. SEGA games malfunction if the system time zone is not JST.

timewarp.label: Time warp
timewarp.desc: Experimental time-of-day warping hook that skips over the hardcoded server maintenance period.

writeable.label: Allow clock writes
writeable.desc: Allow game to adjust system clock and time zone settings.

title.label: Title server
title.desc: Rewrites the title server hostname for certain games.

default.label: Default host
default.desc: Controls hostname of all of the common network services servers.

router.label: Router override
router.desc: Overrides the target of the tenporouter.loc and bbrouter.loc hostname lookups.

startup.label: Startup host
startup.desc: Overrides the target of the naominet.jp host lookup.

billing.label: Billing host
billing.desc: Overrides the target of the ib.naominet.jp host lookup.

aimedb.label: AimeDB host
aimedb.desc: Overrides the target of the aime.naominet.jp host lookup.

replaceHost.label: Replace HTTP Host header
replaceHost.desc: Replace the HOST field in HTTP request headers with the settings above.

startupPort.label: Startup port
startupPort.desc: Overrides the port of connections to the startup server.

billingPort.label: Billing port
billingPort.desc: Overrides the port of connections to the billing server.

aimedbPort.label: AimeDB port
aimedbPort.desc: Overrides the port of connections to the aimedb server.

enable.label: Enable DS EEPROM
enable.desc: Enable DS EEPROM emulation. Disable to use the DS EEPROM chip on a real AMEX.

region.label: Region mask
region.desc: AMEX Board region code (1: Japan, 4: Export, 8: China).

enable.label: Enable EEPROM
enable.desc: Enable bulk EEPROM emulation. Disable to use the bulk EEPROM chip on a real AMEX.

path.label: EEPROM path
path.desc: Path to the storage file for EEPROM emulation.

enable.label: Enable GPIO
enable.desc: Enable GPIO emulation. Disable to use the GPIO controller on a real AMEX.

sw1.label: SW1 key
sw1.desc: Keyboard binding for Nu chassis SW1 button (alternative Test).

sw2.label: SW2 key
sw2.desc: Keyboard binding for Nu chassis SW2 button (alternative Service).

enable.label: Enable graphics hooks
enable.desc: Enables graphic hooks.

windowed.label: Force windowed
windowed.desc: Force the game to run windowed.

framed.label: Add frame in windowed
framed.desc: Add a frame to the game window if running windowed.

monitor.label: Monitor index
monitor.desc: Select the monitor to run the game on. (Fullscreen only, 0 = primary screen)

dpiAware.label: DPI aware
dpiAware.desc: Sets the game to be DPI-aware. Prevents Windows scaling.

enable.label: Enable hardware monitor
enable.desc: Enable hwmon emulation. Disable to use the real hwmon driver.

enable.label: Enable JVS
enable.desc: Enable JVS port emulation. Disable to use the JVS port on a real AMEX.

foreground.label: Input only when focused
foreground.desc: Only enables input when the game's main window is focused.

enable.label: Enable IO4
enable.desc: Enable IO4 port emulation. Disable to use the IO4 port on a real ALLS.

foreground.label: Input only when focused
foreground.desc: Only enables input when the game's main window is focused.

coin.label: Coin key
coin.desc: Keyboard button to increment coin counter.

enable.label: Enable keychip emulation
enable.desc: Enable keychip emulation. Disable to use a real keychip.

gameId.label: Game ID
gameId.desc: Override the game's four-character model code.

platformId.label: Platform ID
platformId.desc: Override the game's four-character platform code.

billingPub.label: Billing public key path
billingPub.desc: Set the actual keychip RSA public key path.

billingType.label: Billing type
billingType.desc: Sets the billing type (1 = rental, 0 = purchase).

subnet.label: Subnet
subnet.desc: The LAN IP range that the game will expect.

enable.label: Enable network virtualization
enable.desc: Enable network environment virtualization.

addrSuffix.label: Address suffix
addrSuffix.desc: The final octet of the local host's IP address on the virtualized subnet.

routerSuffix.label: Gateway suffix
routerSuffix.desc: The final octet of the default gateway's IP address on the virtualized subnet.

macAddr.label: MAC address
macAddr.desc: The MAC address of the virtualized Ethernet adapter.

enable.label: Enable hostname virtualization
enable.desc: Enable Windows host name virtualization.

serialNo.label: Serial number
serialNo.desc: Set the Windows host name. This should be an ALLS MAIN ID.

enable.label: Enable SRAM emulation
enable.desc: Enable SRAM emulation. Disable to use the SRAM on a real AMEX.

path.label: SRAM path
path.desc: Path to the storage file for SRAM emulation.

enable.label: Enable path redirection
enable.desc: Enable path redirection.

amfs.label: AMFS path
amfs.desc: Configure the location of the SEGA AMFS volume.

appdata.label: APPDATA path
appdata.desc: Configure the location of the SEGA "APPDATA" volume.

option.label: Option path
option.desc: Configure the location of the "Option" data mount point.

enable.label: Enable E-pay
enable.desc: Enables the Thinca emulation.

hook.label: Enable hook
hook.desc: Enables hooking of respective Thinca DLL functions to emulate the existence of E-Money.

enable.label: Enable OpenSSL hook
enable.desc: Enables the OpenSSL hook to fix the SHA extension bug on Intel CPUs.

override.label: Force override
override.desc: Enables the override to always hook the OpenSSL env variable.

enable.label: Enable ALLS system
enable.desc: Enable ALLS system settings.

freeplay.label: Freeplay
freeplay.desc: Enable freeplay mode. This will disable the coin slot.

enable.label: Enable LED emulation
enable.desc: Enable emulation of the 837-15070-04 controlled lights.

enable.label: Enable Unity hook
enable.desc: Enable Unity hook. This will allow you to run custom .NET code before the game.

targetAssembly.label: Target Assembly
targetAssembly.desc: Path to a .NET DLL that should run before the game.
